attributes.action: Change the name of Liverpool Football Club to Anti Football Club!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Tony,

Its obvious you made a hash of it in Iraq, lucky for you an upstanding citizen like myself is here to rescue his Prime Minister!

In your last act as Prime Minister can you introduce legislation in Parliament to rename this football club.

It would be the legacy you have been seeking all this time and cancel Iraq out!

Many Thanks,

Grateful Citizen.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
